# Security PR template

PR title: [SECURITY] (short description)

## Summary

One-line summary of the change and why it is required.

## Attack

Short description of the vulnerability or risk being addressed.

## Fix

Describe what was changed (files, logic, tests).

## Tests

List of tests added/updated and how to run them.

## Migration

Any migration or data changes required and rollout plan.

## Monitoring

New metrics/alerts/logging added.

## Rollout

Feature flags, canary plan, and rollback steps.

## Reviewers

Security lead, API platform engineer, retailer integrator

---

Please ensure all checks pass and add the relevant changelog and project state updates.
